content: Property HDB BTO CPF Asked by AnonymousAsked on 13 Jun 2019Can CPF OA be used to service my bank loan for HDB BTO? Or are bank loans only serviceable by cash?Looking for a HDB BTO but got a few questions to ask. hope someone can help me thank you!1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

WnkLevel 3. WonderkidAnswered on 13 Jun 2019Hi yes, CPF OA can be used to service your bank loan. You can refer to the below link for a good article written for a comparison between Bank Loan VS CPF Loan:https://blog.seedly.sg/the-complete-guide-bank-hdb-loan/0 comments1
